Class AbstractIngestTransportClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xbib.elasticsearch.support.client.AbstractTransportClient

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Feeder, Ingest
    Direct Known Subclasses:

extends AbstractTransportClient
implements Ingest
